short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter the Goodreads activity feed to show only reviews, ratings and books added

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If your friends-list on Goodreads contains people who comment a lot on other people's status updates, those comments usually show in you feed as well. If you're mainly interested what books other are reading and rating themselves, this extension will filter out the other updates from your timeline.
